title: Episode 1108 - From 'Boy Meets World' to Adult Film Star
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
description:
Adult film star and 'Boy Meets World' and 'White Chicks' actress Maitland Ward joins the show to talk about her transition from Hollywood actress to porn, why she loves sexual performance, her favorite scenes, how her husband convinced her she should start doing porn, and her new book "X-Rated".
